description.oldValue: ,Currently, OCR is available only for standalone Images. With this update image-only PDF and TIFF files in OneDrive and SharePoint will also benefit from OCR.
description.newValue: ,Currently, OCR is available only for standalone Images. With this update image-only PDF and TIFF files in OneDrive and SharePoint will also benefit from OCR. Note: We will not be rolling out at this time. We apologize for any inconvenience this might cause.
